field.name: fInnerBillboardX
field.desc: x dist either side of the inner billboard pos.

field.name: fIinnerBillboardYAbove
field.desc: y dist above the inner billboard pos.

field.name: fInnerBillboardYBelow
field.desc: y dist below the inner billboard pos.

field.name: fOuterBillboardX
field.desc: x dist either side of the outer billboard pos.

field.name: fOuterBillboardYAbove
field.desc: y dist above the outer billboard pos.

field.name: fOuterBillboardYBelow
field.desc: y dist below the outer billboard pos.

field.name: fMinDistForInfluence
field.desc: Minimum distance to enemy for influence to be applied.

field.name: fMinDistForMaxInfluence
field.desc: Minimum distance to enemy for max influence to be applied.

field.name: fMaxDistForMaxInfluence
field.desc: Maximum distance to enemy for max influence to be applied.

field.name: fMaxDistForInfluence
field.desc: Maximum distance to enemy for min influence to be applied.

field.name: fDistanceFactorDamping
field.desc: Damping factor based on distance. Increase to soften.

field.name: fMaxYawIntensity
field.desc: Amount of assist to apply to the yaw.

field.name: fMaxPitchIntensity
field.desc: Amount of assist to apply to the pitch.

field.name: fInfluenceDamping
field.desc: Damping applied to the overall influence. 0 = none, Increase to take longer to blend to the max.

field.name: fSprintFactor
field.desc: Multiplier on how much follow is applied when sprinting.

field.name: bUseRightStickAssist
field.desc: Use the right stick assistance.

field.name: fMaxDistForRightStickAssist
field.desc: Max dist to enemy for right stick assist.

field.name: fYawRightStickAssist
field.desc: Yaw intensity for right stick assist.

field.name: fPitchRightStickAssist
field.desc: Pitch intensity for right stick assist.

field.name: fCamRotMod
field.desc: How much to dampen camera rotation compared to relative angle changes.

field.name: fCamRotModOuter
field.desc: How much to dampen camera rotation compared to relative angle changes in outer billboard.

field.name: fTowardCentreMod
field.desc: How much to dampen rotations that would move crosshair closer to enemy center.

field.name: fCamRotBlendRate
field.desc: Rate at which the camRot values blend as they change. Time = 1/blendRate.
